thread.section_title: Scotland travel information, holiday ideas, advice and reviews
thread.title: Macbeth filming locations around Britain

author: Telegraph Staff
title: Macbeth filming locations around Britain
text:
MORE... 
A new film adaptation of Shakespeare’s Macbeth , starring Michael Fassbender as the power-hungry anti-hero and Marion Cotillard as Lady Macbeth, shines the spotlight on some of the most dramatic landscapes in Scotland and the North East. Much of it was shot on Skye and at Bamburgh Castle in Northumberland, but it’s possible to visit sites from the play, and those linked to the real 11th-century Scottish king. 
Here Caroline Eden explores the settings of the film's most dramatic scenes. Picture: Studio Canal
